category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 39 (Preparation and keeping of meeting minutes, etc.)
contents: Article 39 (Preparation and keeping of meeting minutes, etc.) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall prepare meeting minutes recording the date and time of the Board of Directors meeting, place, list of attendees, remarks made by attendees at the meeting, meeting results, etc., ② In accordance with the provisions of Paragraph 1, The meeting minutes prepared accordingly shall be preserved after reporting and confirmation to the next board of directors., ③ The Chairman of the Board may request that subscribers, former subscribers, beneficiaries, beneficiaries, and other interested parties of the National Pension Service disclose the meeting minutes pursuant to the provisions of paragraph 1. In one case, it must be disclosed. However, matters related to management secrets and cases determined by resolution of the board of directors in accordance with the Act on Disclosure of Information by Public Institutions may be excluded.
